name: Stairs (itch) (CharlieD_Dev)
description:
How To Play (use controller)

Controls:
Left stick to move
Right stick to look

What You Do:
At the start you must tie your shoes *
Then walk up the stairs as many times as you can without tripping
You have 180 seconds
Tripping:
There Are Multiple Ways You Can Trip
 Walking Too Fast
 Walking Too Slow
 Not tying your shoes well enough

Credits:
Gamedev - UE4
Music - Boscaceoil
3d stuff - Blender (kinda)

* use left stick for the left shoe and right stick of the right shoe. You must connect the red part of each string.
